```tsx
const columns = [
  {
    label: 'Campaign Type',
    name: 'campaignType',
    type: 'Radios',
    options: [
      {
        label: 'All',
        key: 'test-id-1',
        value: '',
      },
      {
        label: 'Type1 ',
        value: 'Type1',
        key: 'test-id-2',
      },
    ],
  },
  {
    label: 'Campaign Start Date',
    name: 'dateRange',
    type: 'DateRange',
  },
  {
    label: 'Receive Time',
    name: 'receiveTime',
    type: 'SortingRadios',
    options: [
      {
        label: 'Ascending',
        key: 'test-id1',
        value: 1,
      },
      {
        label: 'Descending',
        key: 'test-id2',
        value: -1,
      },
    ],
  },
];

const defaultValues = {
  campaignType: {
    value: '',
    label: 'Campaign Type',
  },
  dateRange: {
    value: 'Campaign Start Date',
    label: 'ALL',
  },
  receiveTime: {
    value: 1,
    label: 'Receive Time',
  },
};

export const YourComponent: React.FC<Props> = (props) => {
  const [filterData, setFilterData] = useState(defaultValues);
  const [visible, setVisible] = useState(false);
  const onClose = () => setVisible(false);
  const onFilterConfirm = (selectedValue) => {
    setFilterData(selectedValue); // save current state
    // do your rest task
  };
  const showFilter = () => setVisible(true);
  return (
    <FilterModal
      modalTitle="filter"
      visible={visible}
      dismissCallBack={onClose}
      columns={filterColumns(t)}
      defaultValues={filterData}
      confirmCallBack={onFilterConfirm}
    />
  );
};
```
